References: Perelmuter & Racine (1995), SDSS DR7 photometry catalogue
Telescope: 0.80-m telescope Joan Oro (TJO), 0.65-m telescope at Ondrejov (OND)
Instrument: Finger Lakes PL4240-1-BI CCD Camera, Moravian Instruments G2-3200 CCD camera
Observatory: Observatori Astronomic del Montsec, Ondrejov observatory
